sentences.en: But we immediately see this for what it is: theory - free gibberish, and model - less nonsense.
sentences.cn: 但我们总是能立刻看穿它的原形: 毫无理论可循的胡言乱语, 不成模型的胡说八道.

sentences.en: By the time we arranging the furniture, Tom was yelling gibberish in the other room, belligerent.
sentences.cn: 我们摆好家具时, 汤姆在另一房间叽哩咕噜爆躁地喊着.

sentences.en: He squirmed and talked to me in gibberish, trying to explain what was wrong.
sentences.cn: 他扭着身体,咕噜地向我说着, 试图解释哪里不舒服.

sentences.en: He's been babbling since he was born, and he's still speaking gibberish.
sentences.cn: 他从出生起就咿咿呀呀, 他现在还是说些听不懂的话.

sentences.en: Here, likelihood you feel I said to pile gibberish, be!
sentences.cn: 说到这里, 可能你觉得我说了一堆废话, 是 啊 !

sentences.en: His hair was wiry and gibberish and brushed backwards from the temples.
sentences.cn: 他的姜黄色的头发乱的象麻绳,好像是从发际线往后梳的.

sentences.en: I must have been insane to listen to your asinine gibberish!
sentences.cn: 我真是昏了头居然听信了你的胡说八道!

sentences.en: If we're lucky to say anything to them, it all gibberish.
sentences.cn: 如果有幸跟她们说话, 只会胡言乱语连自己也不知道说什么.

sentences.en: It was literally gibberish to him.
sentences.cn: 他所听到的只是一些卿卿咕咕的声响而已.

sentences.en: On the sidewalk Soapy began to yell drunken gibberish at the top of his harsh voice.
sentences.cn: 索比在人行道上扯开那破锣似的嗓子,像醉鬼一样胡闹.

sentences.en: Sam came down fromNew York -- he played the guitar and Tom sang along in gibberish.
sentences.cn: 萨姆从纽约赶来 -- 弹吉他,汤姆叽哩咕噜地唱着.

sentences.en: The crap I went through to get that, and it's total gibberish.
sentences.cn: 我得到那个臭东西, 完全是胡说八道.

sentences.en: To a lot of computer experts character, this is gibberish.
sentences.cn: 对许多电脑行家而言, 这是废话.

sentences.en: When he was talking to a girl he could hardly speak, and when he did speak he talked gibberish.
sentences.cn: 他跟女孩儿讲话时几乎张不了口，即便张了口，说起话来也词不达意。

sentences.en: You were talking gibberish in your sleep.

trans.tran_cn: 令人费解的话，莫名其妙的话，胡扯，混字，无意义数据
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone's words or ideas as gibberish, you mean that they do not make any sense
